Ingredients:
4cl Bayou White Rum
1cl Havana Club 3
1cl Yuzu Curacao
3cl Lime
2cl Champagne Syrup
3 dash Saline
Method: Shake all ingredients with ice for ~15s. Double strain into a chilled Nick & Nora glass. Express lime oil.

Ingredients:
4cl Tequila Blanco Sierra
1.5cl Ancho Reyes
1.5cl Dry Orange Curacao
3cl Barbera d'Asti (FLOAT)
3cl Lime
1cl Agave
3 dash Saline
Method: Add all ingredients except the red wine. Add ice and shake 10–15s. Double strain into a chilled rocks glass with Himalayan salt. Add fresh ice, then add red wine as a float (or let guest do it).

Ingredients:
4cl Tanqueray Gin
1cl Galliano
1cl Belle Pear Liqueur
1cl Orgeat (sweet almond milk with rose water)
1cl Passion Syrup
2cl Lemon juice
6–8cl Orange juice (freshly squeezed, TOP UP)
3 dash Saline
3 dash Walnut bitters
Method: Add all ingredients except orange juice into a chilled highball glass with ice. Top up with orange juice and stir well.

Ingredients:
4cl Plantaray (Plantation) Pineapple Rum
2cl Belle Pear Liqueur
3cl Pineapple juice
3cl Lime
2cl Honey syrup
2cl Egg white (or vegan foamer)
6–9 Mint leaves
3 dash Saline
Method: Add all ingredients into a shaker. Dry shake ~10s, then add ice and wet shake. Double strain into a chilled coupe glass.

Ingredients:
4cl Sierra Tequila Blanco
2cl Mezcal Ilegal Joven
2cl Campari
3cl Pineapple juice
3cl Grapefruit juice
2cl Lime juice
2cl Orgeat
4 dash Absinth
4 dash Peychaud bitters (FLOAT)
Method: Add all ingredients except Peychaud bitters into a shaker with ice. Hard shake and double strain into a chilled tiki mug with crushed ice.
Garnish: Pineapple slice + pineapple leaves; top with Peychaud bitters; straw

Ingredients:
4cl Bulleit Bourbon
2cl Bulleit Rye
1 barspoon Demerara syrup
4 dash Angostura bitters
2 dash Saline
1 dash Orange bitters
Method: Stir all ingredients in a mixing glass with ice. Stir 20–30s and strain into a chilled rocks glass with Nordic ice block. (Optional: add orange peel during stirring.)

Ingredients:
2cl Hendricks Gin
2cl Sweet Vermouth
2cl Campari
3 dash Orange bitters
2 dash Saline
Method: Add all ingredients into a mixing glass with lots of ice. Stir 20–30s and strain into a chilled rocks glass.

Ingredients:
4cl Hendricks Gin
3 dash Saline
Tonic water (top up)
Method: Build in a wine glass with ice. Top up with tonic water and stir well.

Ingredients:
2cl Green Chartreuse
2cl Maraschino liqueur
2cl Hendricks Gin
2cl Lime juice
3 dash Saline
Method: Shake with ice and double strain into a chilled Nick & Nora glass.

Ingredients:
3cl Plantaray (Plantation) Pineapple Rum
2cl Bayou Spiced Rum
1cl Plantaray OFTD Rum (FLOAT)
2cl Dry Orange Curacao
3cl Lime
2cl Orgeat
1cl Simple syrup
4 dash Saline
Method: Shake all ingredients except OFTD rum with ice ~10s. Double strain into a tiki mug. Top up crushed ice. Add straw. Float OFTD on top.
Garnish: Fresh mint + dehydrated lime wheel. Optional: ignite OFTD on lime wheel and dust cinnamon over flame.

Ingredients:
4cl Hendricks Gin
2cl Dry Vermouth
4 dash Saline
Dirty: add 3cl Olive brine
Method: Stir in a mixing glass with lots of ice ~30s and strain into a martini glass.

Ingredients:
4cl Strolli Caramel Vodka
2cl Kahlua
1 shot Espresso
1cl Galliano
1cl Simple syrup
4 dash Saline
4 dash Chocolate bitters
Method: Shake with ice ~15s and double strain into a martini glass.

Ingredients:
4cl Wild Turkey Bourbon
2cl Lemon
2cl Egg white (or vegan foamer)
1cl Simple syrup
4 dash Angostura
2 dash Orange bitters
4 dash Saline
Method: Dry shake 10–15s (no ice), then add ice and wet shake ~10s. Double strain into a chilled rocks glass.
Garnish: Orange oil + fresh orange peel twist
